name: AwPG
description:
Hey! ( •ᴥ•)

I just made a game, for the Icy Jam 1  ༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ

What is it about, you may ask, or what is its title (or you just don't care)? •ᴗ•

The Games title is Akadeax Wonderful role Playing Game (or short, Aw, PG)!

It's a bad, short game, I didn't even have time to make a FRICKING INVENTORY  OR QUEST SYSTEM AHHHH .·´¯`(>▂<)´¯`·.

( I will be further updating this game after this Jam tho (  ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:・ﾟ✧  )

I'm bad at Programming (and life) o(╥﹏╥)o  But I'm kinda proud of this kid (~‾▿‾)~

Soo.... Go Play it, leave a negative comment and give me a bad rating   ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

                                           

- Akadeax©®™ |  ツ |
